subject: Food
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Baseball
Philanthropy
Soup Kitchens
lead_paragraph: After the fans clear out of Yankee Stadium, leftover hot dogs, hamburgers and pizza are sent to pantries, food banks and soup kitchens.
snippet: After the fans clear out of Yankee Stadium, leftover hot dogs, hamburgers and pizza are sent to pantries, food banks and soup kitchens.
